body: This probably made my entire week. Praise be to the artist for giving us a happy ending to this amazing story.

I read the first chapter of this so many years ago. It wasn't even in english yet. I read a lot of regular manga and hentai in Japanese as part of my learning regime. I remember the extremely bittersweet feeling I got at the end of the first chapter. Back then, it ended when they split up. I had no idea there was even a continuation until today. I like how the following chapter has literally no sex in it. It balances out the sex heavy first chapter quite well and gives a better overall conclusion to the story, not resorting to sex being the payoff, but instead getting a chance to see these characters overcome a very big issue in their lives.  Really, I'm actually quite touched by how this ended. Deep down I always wanted them to be able to reconnect, regardless if the personality of "Kanade" did not exist anymore.
Wasn't expecting this to ever get a sequel but I'm glad kanade got a happier ending now. Hopefully we get more.
